pages.text: $(b)Energy Systems$() power advanced equipment. Manage your fuel carefully!

pages.title: Fuel Rod
pages.text: $(l)Fuel Rod Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Iron Ingot$(br)• Redstone Block$(br)• Blaze Rod$(br)• Coal Block$(br)• Full Alchemical Catalyst$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 10 XP, 600 ticks$()$(br2)Powers various machines and devices.

pages.title: Overheated Fuel Rod
pages.text: $(b)Overheated Fuel Rod$()$(br2)A depleted fuel rod. Created when a fuel rod runs out of energy.$(br2)$(violet)Can be recycled or disposed of safely.$()

pages.title: Mana Rocket
pages.text: $(l)Mana Rocket Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Firework Rocket$(br)• Silver Ingot$(br)• Silver Template$(br)• Full Alchemical Catalyst$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 5 XP, 150 ticks$()$(br2)A magical explosive with unique properties!
